description:
Plant-based power and probiotics to help absorb protein and get you back in the game. Skratch Labs added a chocolatey vegan option to their Recovery line. Built on a foundation of pea and rice protein, it's as beneficial to the body as a real meal, but with way less hassle. Most recovery drinks are full of excess ingredients. Skratch Labs used select ingredients that breakdown proteins and sugars to give your body the fuel it needs, when it needs it most.

  • Ingredients: cane sugar, dextrose, pea protein, medium chain triglycerides (derived from coconut), cocoa powder, rice protein, cocoa extract, gum acacia, salt, vanilla extract, bacillus coagulans GBI-30 6086 (probiotic)
  • 10g of pea and rice protein per serving
  • Allergens, contains coconut
name: Skratch Labs Vegan Recovery Sport Drink Mix Chocolate
